auto.title: Auto
auto.description: Prefer Cloud, then BYOK, then local runtime.

cloud.title: SecondLoop Cloud
cloud.description: Prefer Cloud. If unavailable, fallback to BYOK or local runtime.

byok.title: API key (BYOK)
byok.description: Prefer BYOK. Automatically fallback to local runtime on failure.

local.title: Local runtime
local.description: Run embeddings only on local runtime when available.

mediaUnderstanding.title: Media understanding
mediaUnderstanding.description: OCR, captions, and audio transcription source selection.
mediaUnderstanding.preferenceUnavailableHint: Selected media source is unavailable. Running on fallback route.

auto.title: Auto
auto.description: Prefer Cloud, then BYOK, then local capabilities.

cloud.title: SecondLoop Cloud
cloud.description: Prefer Cloud. If unavailable, fallback to BYOK or local capabilities.

byok.title: API key (BYOK)
byok.description: Prefer BYOK. Automatically fallback to local capabilities on failure.

local.title: Local capabilities
local.description: Prefer local runtime/native media understanding only.

semanticParseAutoActions.title: Smarter semantic analysis
semanticParseAutoActions.subtitleEnabled: Enhanced mode is on. Local semantic analysis stays on, and Cloud/BYOK improves automation quality.
semanticParseAutoActions.subtitleDisabled: Enhanced mode is off. Local semantic analysis remains active.
semanticParseAutoActions.subtitleUnset: Not set. Enhanced mode is off by default (local semantic analysis remains active).
semanticParseAutoActions.subtitleRequiresSetup: Sign in with SecondLoop Pro or configure an API key (BYOK) to enable enhanced mode.
semanticParseAutoActions.dialogBody:
Local semantic analysis is always on. When enhanced mode is enabled, SecondLoop may send message text to AI for smarter semantic parsing on top of local analysis.

The text is processed confidentially (not logged or stored). Your vault key and sync key are never uploaded.

This may use Cloud quota or your own provider quota.

mediaAnnotation.title: Media understanding
mediaAnnotation.subtitle: Optional: OCR, image captions, and audio transcripts for better search/storage

routingGuide.title: Choose your AI source
routingGuide.pro: Pro + signed in: uses SecondLoop Cloud by default.
routingGuide.byok: Free/BYOK: add an OpenAI-compatible profile in Ask AI settings, then set it active.

enabled.title: Enable OCR
enabled.subtitle: Run OCR for scanned PDFs and video keyframes when text extraction is insufficient.

languageHints.title: Language hints
languageHints.subtitle: Choose preferred languages for OCR recognition.

pdfAutoMaxPages.title: Auto OCR page limit
pdfAutoMaxPages.subtitle: PDFs above this limit stay in needs-OCR state until you run OCR manually in viewer.

pdfDpi.title: OCR DPI
pdfDpi.subtitle: Higher DPI may improve accuracy but costs more processing time.

linuxModels.title: Desktop OCR models
linuxModels.subtitle: Download local OCR model files for desktop (Linux/macOS/Windows).

status.runtimeMissing: Models are downloaded, but OCR runtime is not ready

confirmDelete.title: Delete downloaded OCR models?
confirmDelete.body: Local desktop OCR may stop working until models are downloaded again.

enabled.title: Transcribe audio attachments
enabled.subtitle: When you add audio, SecondLoop can transcribe it and save encrypted transcript text for playback and search.

engine.title: Transcription engine
engine.subtitle: Choose which engine to use for audio transcription.

descriptions.multimodalLlm: Use a multimodal chat model when available.
descriptions.auto: Let SecondLoop choose the best available engine.

configureApi.title: Configure transcription API
configureApi.subtitle: Pro users can use SecondLoop Cloud. Free users can use an OpenAI-compatible API key profile from Ask AI settings.
configureApi.body: Audio transcription can run with SecondLoop Cloud (requires Pro + sign-in) or an OpenAI-compatible API key profile from Ask AI settings.

setupRequired.title: Image annotations setup required
setupRequired.body: To annotate images, SecondLoop needs a multimodal model.

reasons.cloudUnavailable: SecondLoop Cloud is not available in this build.
reasons.cloudSignIn: Sign in to SecondLoop Cloud to use the Cloud model.
reasons.byokOpenAiCompatible: Add an OpenAI‑compatible API key profile.
reasons.followAskAi: Ask AI must use an OpenAI‑compatible profile, or choose a different multimodal model in Advanced.

annotateEnabled.title: Annotate images
annotateEnabled.subtitle: When you add a photo, SecondLoop may send it to AI to generate an encrypted caption.

searchEnabled.title: Use annotations for search
searchEnabled.subtitle: Include image captions when building search data.

searchToggleConfirm.title: Update search index?
searchToggleConfirm.bodyEnable: Turning this on will rebuild search data so image captions become searchable.
searchToggleConfirm.bodyDisable: Turning this off will rebuild search data to remove image captions from search.

providerMode.title: Multimodal model
providerMode.subtitle: Use a different provider/model for image captions.

descriptions.followAskAi: Use the same setup as Ask AI. (Recommended)
descriptions.cloudGateway: Use SecondLoop Cloud when available. (Requires Pro)
descriptions.byokProfile: Use a specific API key profile (OpenAI‑compatible).

cloudModelName.title: Cloud model name
cloudModelName.subtitle: Override the cloud multimodal model name (optional).

byokProfile.title: API key profile
byokProfile.subtitle: Pick which profile to use for image captions.
byokProfile.noOpenAiCompatibleProfiles: No OpenAI‑compatible profiles found. Add one in API keys.

allowCellular.title: Allow cellular data
allowCellular.subtitle: Use mobile data to annotate images. (Wi‑Fi only by default.)

allowCellularConfirm.title: Use cellular data for image annotations?
allowCellularConfirm.body: Annotating images may upload photos to your chosen AI provider and can use significant data.

cloudEmbeddings.title: Smarter search
cloudEmbeddings.subtitleEnabled: On. Improves search. Uses your Cloud quota.
cloudEmbeddings.subtitleDisabled: Off. Search runs without cloud processing.
cloudEmbeddings.subtitleUnset: Not set. We'll ask when it's first needed.
cloudEmbeddings.dialogBody:
To improve search and memory recall, SecondLoop can send small pieces of text (message previews, todo titles, follow‑ups) to SecondLoop Cloud to generate search data.

The text is processed confidentially (not logged or stored). Your vault key and sync key are never uploaded.

This uses your Cloud quota.

benefits.title: Create a cloud account to subscribe

purchase.title: Subscribe to SecondLoop Pro
purchase.body: A cloud account is required to purchase a subscription.

errors.missingWebApiKey: Cloud sign-in isn't available in this build. If you're running from source, run `pixi run init-env` (or copy `.env.example` → `.env.local`), set `SECONDLOOP_FIREBASE_WEB_API_KEY`, then restart the app.

resetLocalDataThisDeviceOnly.dialogBody: This will delete local messages and clear synced remote data for this device only. It will NOT delete your master password or your AI/sync settings. You will need to unlock again.

resetLocalDataAllDevices.dialogBody: This will delete local messages and clear all synced remote data. It will NOT delete your master password or your AI/sync settings. You will need to unlock again.

askAiSetup.body: To use Ask AI, add your own API key (AI profile) or subscribe to SecondLoop Cloud.

cloudGateway.emailNotVerified: Email not verified. Verify your email to use SecondLoop Cloud Ask AI.

fallback.auth: Cloud sign-in required. Using your API key for this request.
fallback.entitlement: Cloud subscription required. Using your API key for this request.
fallback.rateLimited: Cloud is busy. Using your API key for this request.
fallback.generic: Cloud request failed. Using your API key for this request.

errors.auth: Cloud sign-in required. Open Cloud account and sign in again.
errors.entitlement: Cloud subscription required. Add an API key or try again later.
errors.rateLimited: Cloud is rate limited. Please try again later.

chat.askAiFailedTemporary: Ask AI failed. Please try again.

askAiConsent.title: Before we use AI
askAiConsent.body:
SecondLoop may send the text you type and a few relevant snippets to your chosen AI provider to power AI features.

It will not upload your master password or your full history.

embeddingsConsent.title: Use cloud embeddings for semantic search?
embeddingsConsent.body:
Benefits:
- Better cross-language recall
- Better todo linking suggestions

Privacy:
- We only upload the minimum text needed to generate embeddings
- The snippets are sent to SecondLoop Cloud Gateway and kept confidential (not logged or stored)
- We never upload your vault key or sync key

Usage:
- Cloud embeddings count toward your cloud usage quota

chat.semanticParseStatusSlow: AI is taking longer. Continuing in background…

deleteDialog.message: Deleting removes this thread and its message memberships.

mergeDialog.title: Merge tags?

speechTranscribeIssue.runtimeUnavailable: Speech runtime is currently unavailable on this device. Please retry later.

mediaBackup.description: Uploads encrypted image attachments to your sync storage. Images are downloaded on demand when viewing on another device.

mediaBackup.wifiOnlyBlocked: Wi‑Fi only is on. Connect to Wi‑Fi, or allow mobile data just this once.

cellularDialog.title: Use mobile data?
cellularDialog.message: Wi‑Fi only is on. Uploading over mobile data may use a lot of data.

localCache.subtitle: Deletes cached attachment files on this device (remote copies are kept and can be re-downloaded). Make sure sync/upload has completed.

dialog.title: Clear local storage?
dialog.message: This deletes cached photos and files on this device to save space. Your remote sync storage keeps a copy; items will be re-downloaded on demand when viewed again.

switchDialog.title: Switch to SecondLoop Cloud sync?

sync.missingSyncKey: Enter your sync passphrase and tap Save first.

passphrase.label: Sync passphrase
passphrase.helper: Use the same passphrase on all devices. It’s never uploaded.

deleteDialog.title: Delete profile?
deleteDialog.message: Delete "$name"? This removes it from this device.
